sentences.en: "Morris" is an English corruption of "Moorish", meaning North African.
sentences.cn: Morris在英语中是Moorish的变体，意思是“北非的”。

sentences.en: Batista was keeping himself in power only by a mounting use of repression, corruption and violence.
sentences.cn: 巴蒂斯塔只是靠着越来越频繁地使用镇压, 行贿和暴力来维持其统治.

sentences.en: Charges of corruption were in the air.
His integrity stood out in relief from the corruption of certain officials.
sentences.cn: 某些官员腐化堕落,相形之下他的廉正更引人瞩目.

sentences.en: His revelations of financial corruption were lurid and highly exaggerated, but they had a tremendous impact.
sentences.cn: 他对金融界腐化的揭发是过分渲染和高度夸张的, 但确曾产生巨大影响.

sentences.en: His revelations of financial corruption were lurid and highly exaggerated.
sentences.cn: 他对金融界腐化的揭发是过份渲染和高度夸张的.

sentences.en: In its most general sense, corruption means the perversion or abandonment.
sentences.cn: 就其最一般的意义上说, 舞弊就是堕落,就是背离准则.

sentences.en: It is learned that long has been involved in anti - corruption survey area.
sentences.cn: 据悉,长寿区反贪局已介入调查.

sentences.en: Memory corruption erroneously executing code is always a possibility.
sentences.cn: 错误执行代码导致内存崩溃总是可能的原因.

sentences.en: officials charged with bribery and corruption
sentences.cn: 被指控受贿和贪污的官员

sentences.en: Opposition leaders said that the elections had been tainted by corruption.
sentences.cn: 反对派领导人说，选举中存在舞弊现象。

sentences.en: Purists bemoan the corruption of the language.
sentences.cn: 主张语文纯正的人哀叹语言趋于不纯.

sentences.en: The heat accelerated the corruption of the dead body.
sentences.cn: 天热加速了死尸的腐烂.

sentences.en: The investigation uncovered widespread corruption within the police force.
sentences.cn: 这项调查揭发出了警察机关内部普遍的腐败。

sentences.en: The president faces 54 charges of corruption and tax evasion.
sentences.cn: 总统面临着54项腐败和逃税的指控。

sentences.en: You have gone from corruption to corruption, and now you have culminated in crime.
sentences.cn: 你不断地堕落, 最后终于发展到犯罪.

words.tran_cn: 易腐败的；易堕落的；可以贿赂的
使堕落的；腐败性的；使腐坏的
堕落性；腐败性；易腐败的倾向

trans.tran_cn: 腐败，贪污，受贿，（单词）变体
trans.tran_en: dishonest, illegal, or immoral behaviour, especially from someone with power
